page.title: 08A 7-YR-OLD'S DAY IN DAGENHAM
page.content: On Wednesdays we get our P.E. clothes then we get undressed and go into the hall. We get the climbing frames and benches out and jump and climb and slide on them. We have Assembly where we all sit together and sing hymns. At playtime we all go out together and play in the playground. In the classroom we write stories, do number work and read. Some of us stay at school for dinner and some go home. In the afternoon we finish our work and then we can play with the toys or paint. At the end of the day we have a story or a song and we go home at half past three. At home I play with my sister and have dinner. We watch television for a little while and then I go to bed.
